sequence.name: Re-engagement Sequence
sequence.goal: Win back inactive subscribers before cleanup

emails.preview_text: Ein kurzes Update und eine Frage an Sie
emails.content_brief: Acknowledge absence. Share 1-2 exciting updates they missed. Ask what content they'd prefer. Include re-engagement survey link. Warm, genuine tone.
Curated best content from recent weeks. Choose content based on their industry/interests. Make it irresistible to click. Zero sales pitch.

emails.subject_a: Letzte Nachricht: Sollen wir in Kontakt bleiben?
emails.content_brief: Final email. Transparent: explain they'll be removed if no engagement. One-click to stay subscribed. Respectful tone. Include unsubscribe option prominently.
